name: TBC - An unfinished game
description:
The "game" is a project to try Unity for the first time during 2022 chirstams break. It is a simple turn based combat, with two possible actions: Attack and Heal between the player party and the enemy party.

I'm not an artist (at all) so for this project all the arts and music come from:

  • Slime and Battlefield: https://game-endeavor.itch.io/
  • Main Charachter: https://oisougabo.itch.io/gap-i
  • Music: https://svl.itch.io/rpg-music-pack-svl
  • Title BG Image: https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest

I want to expand the game, so it can actually be played. Some things i want to add are:

  • More charachters and enemies with different stats.
  • A party creator.
  • A free roam section where choose the fight to take.
